mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.neighborhood_name AS "neighborhoodName", a.neighborhood_addr AS "neighborhoodAddr", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", sa.id as "area.id", sa.name as "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON a.area_id = sa.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_neighborhood( id, neighborhood_name, AREA_ID, neighborhood_addr, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{neighborhoodName}, #{area.id}, #{neighborhoodAddr}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_neighborhood SET neighborhood_name = #{neighborhoodName}, area_id=#{area.id}, neighborhood_addr = #{neighborhoodAddr}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
